scripts.test:cdp: npm run build && npx tsx e2e/cdp_extension_test.ts
scripts.test:cdp:multi: npm run build && npx tsx e2e/cdp_multi_page_tests.ts
scripts.test:cdp:background: npm run build && npx tsx e2e/cdp_background_state_tests.ts
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && npx tsx e2e/navigation_e2e_tests.ts
scripts.test:e2e:spa: npm run build && npx tsx e2e/spa_navigation_tests.ts
scripts.test:e2e:multi-tab: npm run build && npx tsx e2e/multi_tab_navigation_tests.ts
scripts.test:e2e:edge: npm run build && npx tsx e2e/edge_cases_tests.ts
